description: Given a device key, deletes a remembered device as the currently signed-in user. For more information about device authentication, see Working with user devices in your user pool. Authorize this action with a signed-in user's access token. It must include the scope aws.cognito.signin.user.admin.

parameters.name: DeviceKey
parameters.description: The unique identifier, or device key, of the device that the user wants to forget.
